example.code:
$newAttribute = New-Object Amazon.ElasticLoadBalancingV2.Model.TargetGroupAttribute $newAttribute.Key = 'deregistration_delay.timeout_seconds' $newAttribute.Value = 600
Edit-ELB2TargetGroupAttribute -TargetGroupArn 'arn:aws:elasticloadbalancing:us-east-1:123456789012:targetgroup/test-tg/a4e04b3688be1970' -Attribute $newAttribute -Region us-east-1
Key Value --- ----- stickiness.enabled false deregistration_delay.timeout_seconds 600 stickiness.type lb_cookie stickiness.lb_cookie.duration_seconds 86400 slow_start.duration_seconds 0 load_balancing.algorithm.type round_robin
example.description: This example modifies the deregistration_delay attribute of the specified Target Group.
